mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_ (uid, order_code, address, post, receiver, mobile, user_message, create_date, status) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{orderCode}, #{address}, #{post}, #{receiver}, #{mobile}, #{userMessage}, #{createDate}, #{orderStatus,typeHandler=OrderStatusEnumHandler})
mapper.sql: SELECT o.id AS 'o_id', o.order_code AS 'o_orderCode', o.address AS 'o_address', o.post AS 'o_post', o.receiver AS 'o_receiver', o.mobile AS 'o_mobile', o.user_message AS 'o_userMessage', o.create_date AS 'o_createDate', o.pay_date AS 'o_payDate', o.delivery_date AS 'o_deliveryDate', o.confirm_date AS 'o_confirmDate', o.status AS 'o_orderStatus', u.id AS 'u_id', u.name AS 'u_name', oi.id AS 'oi_id', oi.number AS 'oi_number', oi.has_review AS 'oi_hasReview', p.id AS 'p_id', p.name AS 'p_name', p.subtitle AS 'p_subTitle', p.original_price AS 'p_originalPrice', p.promote_price AS 'p_promotePrice', p.stock AS 'p_stock' FROM order_ AS o LEFT OUTER JOIN user AS u ON o.uid = u.id LEFT OUTER JOIN order_item AS oi ON o.id = oi.oid LEFT OUTER JOIN product AS p ON oi.pid = p.id

SELECT id, uid, address, post, receiver, mobile, order_code AS 'orderCode', user_message AS 'userMessage', create_date AS 'createDate', pay_date AS 'payDate', delivery_date AS 'deliveryDate', confirm_date AS 'confirmDate', status AS 'orderStatus' FROM order_
mapper.select: WHERE o.id = #{id} ORDER BY o.id DESC
WHERE u.id = #{uid} AND o.status != 'DELETED' ORDER BY o.id DESC
ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{count} OFFSET #{start}
